text: Hélène Langevin-Joliot (born 19 September 1927) is a French nuclear physicist. Her parents were Irène Joliot-Curie and Frédéric Joliot-Curie. She is a member of the French government's advisory committee. Google translation She is a professor of nuclear physics at the Institute of Nuclear Physics at the University of Paris and a director of research at the CNRS. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:French physicists Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:Scientists from Paris
title: Hélène Langevin-Joliot
